attributes.comment:
I strongly disagree with the proposed fee increases. We have adopted our
daughter from China and the costs for international adoption are already so high
that many potential adoptive parents that we know either go into significant debt,
or have to entirely give up their dream of adopting a child.
It is unconscionable to increase adoption related fees up to 66% - the process of
adoption should not be used as an income stream for the government. Please do
not add another burden to the long list of expenses that adoptive parents have to
shoulder. Adoption is in the interest of both the children and families so let's try
to keep it affordable for as many families as possible.
Thank you for your consideration.

Comment on FR Doc # E7-01631
attributes.title: Comment Submitted by Martin Cibulka
